title: Justification - Interpret Meaning of Def Int

content.question: The temperature inside a house <math alttext="t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> hours after midnight (<math alttext="t equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>) is given by the twice-differentiable function <math alttext="H" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>H</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>, where <math alttext="H of t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>H</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></math> is measured in degrees Fahrenheit. Which of the following is an interpretation of the expression <math alttext="H of 0, plus the integral from 0 to 8, of, H prime of t, d t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>H</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>8</mn></mrow></msubsup><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>H</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math> ?

choices.label: The temperature, in degrees Fahrenheit, inside the house at <math alttext="8" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>8</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> A.M. (<math alttext="t equals 8" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>8</mn></math>)

The average temperature, in degrees Fahrenheit, inside the house between midnight and <math alttext="8" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>8</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> A.M. (<math alttext="t equals 8" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>8</mn></math>)

The change in temperature, in degrees Fahrenheit, inside the house between midnight and <math alttext="8" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>8</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> A.M. (<math alttext="t equals 8" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>8</mn></math>)

The average rate of change of the temperature, in degrees Fahrenheit per hour, inside the house between midnight and <math alttext="8" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>8</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> A.M. (<math alttext="t equals 8" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>8</mn></math>)

content.answer: The temperature, in degrees Fahrenheit, inside the house at <math alttext="8" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>8</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> A.M. (<math alttext="t equals 8" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>8</mn></math>)

topic.text: 8.3: Using Accumulation Functions and Definite Integrals in Applied Contexts
